H0.text: Maintaining structural stability is the function that the extensive branching of neurons helps them perform.

H1.text: Stockpile chemical energy is the function that the extensive branching of neurons helps them to perform.

H2.text: Communicate with other neurons is the function that the extensive branching of neurons helps them perform.

H3.text: Secrete hormones is the function that the extensive branching of neurons helps them to perform.

A4.text: Many neurons have only one axon, but this axon may—and usually will—undergo extensive branching, enabling communication with many target cells.
